quotes.author: Warren Buffet
quotes.quote: Price is what you pay. Value is what you get.

quotes.author: Jane Austen
quotes.quote: There is no charm equal to tenderness of heart.

quotes.author: Khalil Gibran
quotes.quote: Life without love is like a tree without blossoms or fruit.

quotes.author: Aesop
quotes.quote: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.

quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt
quotes.quote: Believe you can and you"re halfway there.

quotes.author: Aristotle
quotes.quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.

quotes.author: Emo Philips
quotes.quote: A computer once beat me at chess, but it was no match for me at kick boxing.

quotes.author: Ralph Johnson
quotes.quote: Before software should be reusable, it should be usable.
